title: ELBOW GREASE ANTI-BACTERIAL SPRAY 500ML
features: Kills 99.9% of Bacteria & Germs – Effectively eliminates harmful microorganisms, including E. coli, MRSA, Salmonella, Listeria, and the H1N1 flu virus, ensuring hygienically clean surfaces.
Bleach-Free Formula – Safe for use around children and pets, this non-toxic cleaner leaves no harsh chemical residues.
Versatile Application – Ideal for disinfecting kitchens, bathrooms, dining areas, high chairs, door handles, bins, toilets, and other hard surfaces. ​
Indoor & Outdoor Use – Suitable for both indoor and outdoor cleaning tasks, providing comprehensive germ protection throughout your home. ​
Fresh Fragrance – Leaves a pleasant, clean scent after use, enhancing the freshness of your living spaces.
description: Product Description Elbow Grease Anti-Bacterial Spray 500ml is a powerful, bleach-free disinfectant designed to keep your home hygienically clean. Its advanced formula kills 99.9% of bacteria and germs, including E. coli, MRSA, Salmonella, Listeria, and the H1N1 flu virus, making it ideal for use on various hard surfaces such as kitchen countertops, bathroom fixtures, high chairs, and door handles. Safe for both indoor and outdoor applications, this versatile cleaner leaves behind a fresh fragrance, ensuring a pleasant cleaning experience. Ingredients Contains Amongst Other Ingredients: <5% Non-lonic Surfactants, Cationic Surfactants, Phosphates, Also Contains: Disinfectant: Benzalkonium Chloride 0.25g Per 100g, Perfumes Safety Warning Cautionary notes: causes serious eye irritation. Harmful to aquatic life with long lasting effects. Keep out of reach of children. Read label before use. Do not breathe mist. Wash hands thoroughly after handling. If in eyes: rinse cautiously with water for several minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present and easy to do. Continue rinsing. If eye irritation persists: get medical advice/attention. If medical advice is needed, have product container or label at hand. Avoid release to the environment. Dispose of contents/container in accordance with local requirements for domestic waste disposal. Use biocides safely and sustainable. It is illegal to use this product for uses or in a manner other than prescribed on this label. Use biocides safely. Always read the label and product information before use. See more
